name: red panda amigurumi
notes:
crochet this red panda cat keychain with the diy fluffies free pattern & video.
this video is available for free in english and dutch.

when you make it with cotton sport weight yarn the size will be:
5 cm/ 2 inch.
you can make it bigger by using thicker yarn and a larger crochet hook.

link to written pattern:
https://www.mariskavos.nl/free-red-panda-crochet-pattern/

english video: 
https://youtu.be/jb-oqnmswri

dutch video:
https://youtu.be/req1z04etq0
